channel.title: Vbulletin on Imlauer
channel.description: Recent content in Vbulletin on Imlauer

item.title: Como descargar hilo entero de un Foro vBulletin
item.description: for id in {1..772}; do wget -E --follow-tags=a --reject '*.js,*.css,*.ico,*.txt,*.gif,*.jpg,*.jpeg,*.png,*.mp3,*.pdf,*.tgz,*.flv,*.avi,*.mpeg,*.iso' --header="Accept: text/html" "https://mipagina.com.ar/threads/3934819-mi-hilo/page$id" done
